E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Maybe I'll make you man with one leg, but I make you rich man with one leg.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~哪怕成了只剩一条腿的瘸子，那也是有头有脸的富瘸子。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Them clubs is leveraged to the max already, man. I don't know if there's anything left to sell.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~夜店已经债台高筑了，哥们。都不知道还有没有能卖的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Yeah, great. Thanks. But if you need more cops taken out, crooked or otherwise, you ain't choosing me.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~真好，谢谢您嘞。要是你要干掉更多条子，不管他坏不坏，别选我了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Why would I pay someone to have all the fun?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~为什么要花钱请别人享受这种乐趣？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~There is a particular unit that has a "hard-on" for me. And why? Because Marki Ashvilli won't sell me The Rampage.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~有那么一个小队，跟我杠上了。至于原因？因为Marki Ashvilli不肯把暴怒队卖给我。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Double it! Offer twenty million and then we see if it is not for sale.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~那就加倍！开价两千万，再看它卖不卖。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I just want you to think about it. Do that for me.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我只是叫你思考思考。给个面子吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You mind my asking why a man of your means still gets his hands dirty like this?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我能问一句为什么你这样的人还要亲自动手吗？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I have opportunities for you. Think about them.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我这儿有你的机会。考虑考虑吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Yo, Ray. Shit man, something else came up. I hope you could take care of that thing without me.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~哟，Ray。妈的，哥们，我突然有急事。希望没有我你们也能搞定。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Ha! You don't have any friends. You don't even have a business here. You are nothing in this country. - My sister,
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~－哈！你哪来的朋友。你在这儿都没有事业。在美国你屁都不是。 －我姐姐。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I'm cracking up here, Luis. Hurry the fuck up. How long are you going to be?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我要忙裂开了，Luis。你他妈快点。多久才能到？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I picked you out because I see potential in you. You are lucky to be here.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我看到了你的潜力，相中了你。这是你的福气。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Perhaps I will buy clubs off you as well. You sell them to me?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~也许我还会收购你的夜店。你卖给我吗？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Some of these investors aren't the type to go away. They aren't the type to pay off either.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~有几个投资人可是钉子户，不是把钱还清就能打发走的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You think you run the club, but you are still just security.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你当自己是夜店老板，其实就是个保安。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Stick in formation. Eyes out for anything suspicious.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~保持队型。警惕任何可疑情况。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~The money is making the plans. That's the American way.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~金钱掌控一切，这就是美国的风格。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Is that it then, you just too paranoid to let someone else get nasty?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~也就是说，你多疑到不肯让别人动手？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Not yet - I think there is always a price in this city.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~先不急。我觉得自由城的一切都有价格。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Because the money is better than a fucking leg.
~z~Your pathetic camp master has taught you to fail.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你那可悲的老板只教会了你失败，

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~It is easy. You come on board with us. You leave your fag master.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~很简单。放弃你的基佬主子，过来跟我们混。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I appreciate that, but I'll use my own hardware.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~谢谢了，我用自己的存货就行。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~At least you don't have to clean up the mess.
~z~Look at this. The sensitive modern American male.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~看看他，多愁善感的当代美国男性。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You want I should pay visit to his children at their school?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~需要我去问候他在上学的子女吗？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~If the money tells you to cut your fucking legs off, you will do it.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~如果钱告诉你，砍掉你的狗腿。你会照办的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~If this painting is not hanging on my wall, your head will be.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~要是画没挂到我家墙上，就挂你的项上人头。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Now he is a pill popping joke.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~现在他沦落成嗑药的小丑了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Ashvilli will see what happened to these men.
~z~Of course. Tony pulls the string and the little puppet man dance for him.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~哈哈，当然了。Tony一拉绳子，小木偶就手舞足蹈了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You didn't get yourself into this. I choose you.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~不是你自己摊上的，是我选择了你。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Okay, man. Good for you. You got a nice place here, Mr. B.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好吧，哥们。你喜欢就好。这地方不错啊，B先生。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Don't worry about it, man. I like the set up here.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~没关系，哥们。这里布置得还不错。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~They will be scraping them off the wall for weeks.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~得花几个星期才能把墙刮干净。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I am trying to buy him out of every position he holds.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我要试着买走他的所有地位。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Thanks, bro, but I'm the kind of degenerate who carries his own bombs.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~谢了兄弟，但我是那种随身携带炸弹的败类。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I don't care about other investors. They will forget about debts if I am involved.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我不在乎其他投资人。只要我一出手，债务就烟消云散了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~We will do what we did in the garage. Boom boom. Bye bye.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我们就重现车库里的那一幕。嘭嘭。拜拜。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Ah, Luis, excuse us. We have been rude.
~z~This is what the world sees. This is what they think of when they see you.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~这就是别人对他的印象。这就是别人看见你之后的想法。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~This what you want to do your whole life?
~z~He is a traitor of his country - a worm.
~z~Anyway, it's not my place to sell them. I have a stake, but Tony's got the controlling share.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~再说了，卖不卖我说了不算。我是有股份，但决定权还是Tony的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~How'd I get myself into this shit, man?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我怎么就摊上这种事了，哥们？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~He has no choice but to sell. We have taken away his protection.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~他没得选，必须卖。罩他的人都被我们干了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~But he has been here for a long time, so he has bought connections
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~但他待得够久，有了自己的人脉，

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~A difficult situation. It seems I am being investigated by the National Office of Security Enforcement.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~形势严峻啊。我似乎被国家安全办公室调查了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Shut up, bitch. Take your pills. A friend of mine is here.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~闭嘴吧，婊子。嗑你的药去吧。我朋友在这呢。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~He lives here in exile, like all cowards.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~他流亡到这里，一如其他懦夫。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~We don't want to be here any longer than we have to be, come on.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~咱们不能在这儿待太久，快点。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~What the fuck is this? I don't like killing government agents so I ain't got no balls? Gimme a break.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你他妈说啥呢？不想杀政府的人，所以我没种？饶了我吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~that others of us have not been able to acquire.
~z~Hey, don't say that about Tony, man. I can't have you talking shit about him.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~喂，不许这么说Tony。哥们。我不允许你抹黑他。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Then maybe you a fag. I thought you were heterosexual one in a partnership.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~可能你是基佬吧。我还以为你是合伙人里的攻。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You are Tony's gimp and you won't admit it.

E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好极了！好极了！Marki的走狗都烤焦了！

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Thank you. I like you. I make you rich. I make you man.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~谢谢。我看好你。我带你发，我带你达。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~He uses his position here to keep back all those who are still involved in the East.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~他利用在美国的地位妨碍那些东欧幸存者。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You need to go home and exfoliate your balls? May as well cut them off.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你要回家洗洗卵蛋上的死皮吗？要么直接切了吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Hey! You bring me to this fucking country and you keep me in an ugly cage. No one on TV lives in fucking Dukes.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~喂！你把我送到这个傻逼国家，关在这个破笼子里。电视上的大牌哪会住Dukes区啊？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~This don't feel right. The door is open.
~z~It should be. Marki is a weakling.
~z~For now. Those were the only guys Marki had on us.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~暂时没了。Marki拿来对付我们的人也就这些。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I can't believe we just took out a whole NOOSE team.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我们居然干翻了一整支NOOSE小队。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Okay. Give them here. I'll need that Advanced MG too if I'm going to take on the NOOSE.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好的。都拿来吧。既然要跟NOOSE打架，那把高级机枪我也要了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Don't worry, bro. I'm already packing some of my own.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~不必了，兄弟。我自己身上就有。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~This little trip should have severed a good deals of those connections,
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~今天这一趟应该能敲打敲打他的人脉，

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I still have smell of meat in nose.
~z~Then you come and move all my stuff into hallway and fill place with fucking guitars.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~然后你来了，把我的东西全部搬到门厅，腾出位置堆这些破吉他。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Let me know when Tony next has hand up your ass and ventriloquist's dummy can talk.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~哪天Tony把手插你屁眼里，拿你表演腹语术了，记得通知我。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Yes. "Once upon a time." Is an ancient memory.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~是啊，「很久很久以前...」这都是老黄历了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I'm gonna be honest, I kind of prefer a hot girl and a bottle of wine to a gun fight with the terror squad.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~我是认真的。比起陪恐怖分子枪战，我更喜欢喝酒和辣妹。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~It is important to keep an eye on your people.
~z~The NOOSE, bro? I'll need more than bombs. GImme that machine gun you got there and I might just be ready.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~国安办，兄弟？只有炸弹还不够。给我你那把机枪吧，这样稳一点。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~The city will be safer place without their corruption.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~没有腐败的他们，这座城市会更加安全。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You bright guy, Luis. I still like you.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你是聪明人，Luis。我还是很看好你。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Fuck you, Ray. You have ruined my life!
~z~Tony has some tough times, but he ain't no embarrassment. He used to be the coolest guy in this city.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~Tony是陷入了窘境，但绝对不会是笑话。他曾经是城里最酷的人，

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Fuck that. I got explosives already. Hand over that MG of yours and I'm ready to go.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~算了吧。黏弹我早有了。那把机枪给我，我就准备好了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Look, I'm, ahh, taking care of some personal business. I'll come see you later, okay?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~听我说，我、我在忙个人事务。晚点找你好吗？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~and will give others involved a pause before they continue their association.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~让相关人士重新考虑要不要继续与他合作。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Okay, man, you sent your message. Who is this guy?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好吧哥们，消息已经传达了。这人是谁？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~It is piece of shit. I bought it for my sister.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~这里是个屁。我买给我姐姐的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I don't need no bombs, bro, but I will need one of them Mgs if I'm gonna take on the NOOSE.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~炸弹不需要，兄弟。但跟NOOSE干还是给我杆机枪吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You don't get a kick out of it? It does not get your dick hard?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你没有得到快感吗？你没有变得鸡儿梆硬吗？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You made good choice coming here. Fag man no good.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~来这里见我是明智的选择。基佬，不行。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Is true. You are one who blew them up.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~实话呀。还是你把他们炸飞的。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~If this is what you call fun, then fair enough.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~如果这也算是乐趣的话，那好吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~ I would like you to think about what you can become without this weight around your neck.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~希望你好好思考思考，没有这个累赘，你能成就多少。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~There is this team are tracing a car of mine. Take out the whole team. No exceptions.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~这支小队盯上了我的一辆车。干掉整支小队。斩草除根。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Okay. Calm down. We got no more law enforcement to expunge.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好啦，冷静点。以后就不用杀什么执法人员了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~It is a lesson to all those who have welcomed him here.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~这是给他的哈巴狗们上的一堂公开课。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~I ain't gonna take you up on the bomb offer 'cause I got my own, but I will take that Advanced MG you got there.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~不用你们的黏弹了，我自己有。但是这把高级机枪我要了。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Hey, the problem ain't just gonna disappear over here if we kill some crooked cops.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~嘿，光是干掉几个黑警也不能解决问题吧。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~she is still getting adjusted. We all are.
~z~I don't like this. They left the car door open.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~感觉不太对。他们车门都没关。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Gimme that Advanced MG you got there as well. I ain't taking no chances with the NOOSE.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你那挺高级机枪也给我吧。我可不想跟国安办赌运气。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Okay, man, if that's what the money wants...
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~好吧，哥们，那我就顺从钱的旨意...

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~What do you mean, "what's up"? Where are you?
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~「咋的了」是什么意思？你在哪呢？

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~You will get rid of them. I will own this fucking team.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~你们要除掉他们。这支球队老子志在必得。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~These gay jokes ain't gonna stop, are they?
~z~These guitars are all collector's items - celebrity rock memorabilia.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~这些吉他都是收藏品——摇滚明星的纪念品。

E2BG1CA.original: ~z~Hey, I owe my life to Tony.
~z~That you did, Luis. A serviceable job. Most competent.
E2BG1CA.translated: ~z~就是你干的，Luis。手到擒来的活，你最擅长了。
